Name: Status Heizkreis
Description: Heating circuit status (enumeration with multiple status codes)

Name: Durchfluss WMZ
Description: Current flow heat meter in liters

Name: Tagesertrag
Description: Daily yield in Wh (2 x 16-bit registers)

Name: Gesamtenergie thermisch Heizung + Trinkwassererwärmung
Description: Total thermal energy for heating and DHW in Wh/1000=kWh

Name: thermische Energie Trinkwassererwärmung
Description: Thermal energy for DHW in Wh/1000=kWh

Name: thermische Energie Heizung
Description: Thermal energy for heating in Wh/1000=kWh

Name: Gesamtenergie elektrisch Heizung + Trinkwassererwärmung
Description: Total electrical energy for heating and DHW in Wh/1000=kWh

Name: elektr. Energie Trinkwassererwärmung
Description: Electrical energy for DHW in Wh/1000=kWh

Name: elektr. Energie Heizung
Description: Electrical energy for heating in Wh/1000=kWh

Name: thermische Energie Kühlung
Description: Thermal energy for cooling in Wh/1000=kWh

Name: elekt. Energie Kühlung
Description: Electrical energy for cooling in Wh/1000=kWh

Name: PV Überladung möglich
Description: 0=No overcharging of WVT possible 1=WVT can be overcharged with PV surplus

Name: PV-Überladung aktiv
Description: 0=No PV surplus available 1=Heat pump started due to PV surplus

Name: Stückholz therminator
Description: 0=No wood fueling needed 1=Wood can be added

Name: Pelletverbrauch gesamt seit Update auf V21.050 oder jünger
Description: Total pellet consumption since update to V21.050 or newer

Name: produzierte Wärmemenge gesamt seit Update auf V21.050 oder jünger
Description: Total heat produced since update to V21.050 or newer

Name: Kaminkehrer kurz vor Ende
Description: 0=Chimney sweep mode active/not enabled 1=Chimney sweep mode ending soon

Name: Statuszeile Kaskade FWM
Description: Fresh water module cascade status line

Name: FWM Kaskade Gesamtdurchfluss
Description: Fresh water module cascade total flow

Name: FWM Kaskade Solltemperatur
Description: Fresh water module cascade target temperature

Name: Zirkulation 1 anfordern
Description: 0->1: Activate circulation 1 program if not set to "Always Off"

Name: Zirkulation 2 anfordern
Description: 0->1: Activate circulation 2 program if not set to "Always Off"

Name: Zirkulation 3 anfordern
Description: 0->1: Activate circulation 3 program if not set to "Always Off"

Name: Zirkulation 4 anfordern
Description: 0->1: Activate circulation 4 program if not set to "Always Off"

Name: Kaminkehrerfunktion Start/Stopp
Description: 1=Start chimney sweep function 2=End chimney sweep function

Name: Pelletvorratslagerraum befüllt
Description: 1=Reset pellet consumption since last storage room filling
